html:
4.22.17  12:41 am   Do you think the video will be worth the wait?

     i haven't waited. i have been making it the entire time, which was surely more difficult than waiting
4.22.17  12:06 am   Are the times listed next to each question to time they were asked or the time you answered them?

4.22.17  12:04 am   hey Bill, would you say you have made over 30 jingles for your new video so far? i know you have around 62 planned out

     i mostly did the instruments last fall, with temp vocals. now i am doing the finals. up to number 52, out of 65 in total, depending on how you count them
4.22.17  12:03 am   What is your favorite movie?

4.21.17  11:53 pm   favorite crime to commit?

     existing

4.21.17  11:49 pm   Would you let me hold your hand for half a dill pickle chip and a strand of Bill Clinton's hair?

     holding your hand would surely be better than either of the 2 things you mentioned

4.21.17  10:49 pm   at what age is a human considered ~wise~?

     it normally occurs gradually

4.21.17  10:03 pm   Is it shameful to make a rookie mistake if you're actually quite experienced in the matter at hand?

     you can be ashamed if you want

4.21.17  9:28 pm   I'm trying not to waste time, but I keep getting frustrated by the little things. How do you keep from getting frustrated?

     find some biggger things to get frustrated about

4.21.17  9:17 pm   Do you expect the video to be over or under 19 minutes at all, or will it be exactly 19 minutes?

     the run time should be about 19:23

4.21.17  9:14 pm   i've just noticed that on hoj, during the "it's probably gonna be this guy, who happens to be way more rich and powerful than the others" it flashes to trump. how did you know

     i knew donald trump was rich and powerful because he was famous for being rich and powerful. particularly during the 1980s, which is why i used a picture of him from the 1980s

4.21.17  8:53 pm   were you awake when I posted this?

     yes

      and are you awake while you're answering this?

     yes

      and are you ever awake?

     yes

4.21.17  8:44 pm   Why are so many philosophies so damn bleak, like Absurdism and acynicism and all that stuff

      maybe it's just the bleak ones that are currently popular

4.21.17  8:30 pm   Do you think it is egotistical to have a questions page?

     no. but perhaps it is egotistical to have this entire website in the first place

4.21.17  7:40 pm   Since vine is down, shouldn't you take the link off the website?

     yes, i'm going to fix up the categories pages after this video is done
4.21.17  6:43 pm   when will you post on youtube again?

4.21.17  6:42 pm   What is the ultimate file format?

     a binary number, i guess
4.21.17  6:32 pm   what's your favorite adjective

4.21.17  6:30 pm   If I was a communist, and you were a capitalist, how would you convince me to agree to your capitalist agenda?

     make you an offer you can't refuse

4.21.17  6:28 pm   is one of the jingles in the new video "nothing is funny"?

     no

4.21.17  6:16 pm   how will i know which video that is the currently-upcoming one to look for if you make more 19 minute video ones and i forget the title in the future?

     it will be the first video uploaded in 2017

4.21.17  6:09 pm   what happened to the sneak peeks in instagram?

     they were posted, and viewed, on instagram

4.21.17  6:08 pm   after the next long video... you will still have a long pause making another long video?

     i never took a pause. i have been making content non-stop since early 2014

4.21.17  6:03 pm   got any tips for neutralizing the hate?

     do nothing

4.21.17  6:02 pm   have you already finished the video but you are just tricking us to create hype?

     no

4.21.17  5:06 pm   How often do you use the word "snarky"?

     i don't think i've ever used it

      I think it's one of the worst words. What's your least favorite word?
4.21.17  4:57 pm   what's the first meme that you remember?

4.21.17  4:55 pm   How's the new vid coming along, Bill?

     wild and crazy

     I'm looking forward to it.

4.21.17  4:39 pm   i know absolutely nothing about music theory, is there some rule of thumb for how to make chords sound good?

     rule of ear, not thumb
4.21.17  4:06 pm   if i can ask, what're you thinking of doing after this video? and if i can't ask, then... do you have a favourite flower and if so what kind

4.21.17  3:55 pm   Would you say the new video is human-oriented?

     yes

4.21.17  3:35 pm   The most recent anagram is really harsh. Like how are you supposed to release the new video if you kill yourself?

     that is a great point
4.21.17  3:04 pm   should I be ashamed if a question that I ask gets green hyperlinked
4.21.17  1:31 pm   why is thank you spelled incorrectly?
4.21.17  1:24 pm   will you ever make a list of those green/commonly asked questions?

4.21.17  12:18 pm   will you answer this question with maybe

     i could but i'm not going to
4.21.17  12:18 pm   better yet when is your next video coming out?
4.21.17  12:18 pm   when is your next history video?

4.21.17  11:58 am   Why are the pitches in "do re mi" not do re and mi

     the chords are

4.21.17  11:34 am   Are you aware that Pepe the Frog is a racist symbol and for reading this question that you are racist?

     no

4.21.17  11:01 am   how did you get into making music?

     i don't remember

4.21.17  10:51 am   Why do people believe humans were once not humans, other than the fact our dna is similar to something not human?

     i think if you spend enough time studying dead bones you can figure a lot of stuff out

4.21.17  10:40 am   u feelin good about this video so far?

     oh hell yeah

4.21.17  10:38 am   i know why you always do your thing, and don't waste your time. it is because you are not afraid.

     i actually Am afraid, of not getting all the stuff done

4.21.17  10:15 am   Which Beatle would you rather follow into battle against the human over lords: Paul McCartney, Ringo Star, Lenonn Jon, Steven, Zalathar the Eater of a Thousand Galaxies, Mike Pence, cat, Paul McCartney 2.0 (the sequel), The Sentient Rock, Gene Simmons, mARK, or no one you would rather sit in your home and avoid any and all conflicts?

     i already followed paul into the battle, long ago

4.21.17  9:55 am   What was your most popular video before History of Japan was released?

     still a piece of garbage (the vine version)

4.21.17  9:45 am   How do I motivate myself to do the work I should really be doing but have no motivation for?

     you can't really change your motivation. whatever your reasons are for doing the project, that's your motivation. if you have no reason to do the project, then you wouldn't do it

4.21.17  9:39 am   will you do music videos filmed in places other than your room?

     that would be nice

4.21.17  9:23 am   if you use microsoft word or google documents, do you turn automatic capitalization off?

     i would if i did

4.21.17  8:27 am   Who is God tho

     not exactly
